content: this is a listing of crochet baby turban/ hat/ beanie/ bonnet - spring breeze **the free pattern can be found here ** croby patterns blog 1 **you can find more patterns here ** my ravelry pattern shop 2 > buy 3 patterns or more and get 20% off > on the entire purchase no coupon is > needed happy crocheting **sizes ** newborn baby 3 - 6 months baby 6 - 12 months toddler child teen and adult **materials** yarn aran weight yarn - drops paris crochet hook 5 0 mm you will also need 2 stitch markers a tapestry needle scissors **stitches ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet two stitches together decrease **number of pages in pdf ** 4 **in the pdf ** written instructions step-by-step photo tutorial and video tutorial youtube **language ** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy **please note ** this pattern can be found with ads on my blog croby patterns and video tutorial on my youtube channel my blog crobypatterns com youtube http //bit ly/crobypatternsyt the price is for the pattern/tutorial/pdf only not the finished product **returns** please contact me if you have any questions before you make a purchase as i am selling pdf files you can t fully return them or exchange them so there are no refunds on digital files this digital file is copyright © 2020 croby patterns 1 https //crobypatterns com/baby-turban-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //www ravelry com/designers/croby-patterns
